tags.name: Multi-Store API v2
tags.description: Endpoints for updating multiple stores with a single request

tags.name: Multi-Store API v1
tags.description: Endpoints for updating multiple stores with a single request

tags.name: Auth API
tags.description: Endpoints for authentication. The returned token must be used as Bearer Authentication to authorize all subsequent requests.

tags.name: Monitoring API
tags.description: Endpoints for get all or single store status metrics

get.summary: Get single store security tags based on store Uuid/externalID
get.description: Central Permission Required: View Store Security tags

put.description: Central Permission Required: Modify Store Security Tags

post.description: Central Permission Required: Modify Store Security Tags

delete.summary: Delete multiple items in multiple stores
delete.description:
Delete items in one or more store with the provided list of item IDs
Returns an id to the asynchronous delete request, which can be used to query the items result endpoint. Limited to 100 items per request. Store Permission Required: Modify Items

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description:
The list of store IDs that should delete the list of items. The store IDs can be external IDs or store UUIDs
If store id is not mentioned then it will update all the stores by default

parameters.name: itemIds
parameters.description: Item IDs to be deleted

patch.description:
Updates the items in one or more stores with the provided list of items
Existing items will be updated. New items will be added.
Only populated fields will be updated. null or empty fields will not clear the corresponding field of existing items.Returns an id to the asynchronous update request, which can be used to query the items status endpoint. Store Permission Required: Modify Items

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description:
The List of store id's to perform update item.The store id's can be external id's or the store uuid's
If store id is not mentioned then it will update all the stores by default

requestBody.description: A list of items to patch the existing list of items with.

patch.summary: Update and add multiple items using csv
patch.description:
Updates the items in one or more stores with the provided list of items
Existing items will be updated. New items will be added.
Empty fields for defined columns will clear the corresponding field of existing items.Returns an id to the asynchronous update request, which can be used to query the items status endpoint. Store Permission Required: Modify Items Central Permission Required: CSV file import

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description:
The List of store id's to perform update item.The store id's can be external id's or the store uuid's
If store id is not mentioned then it will update all the stores by default

parameters.name: startRowIndex
parameters.description: The index of the row in the csv input where the parsing of the data should start from. This is usefull if the csv starts with irrelevant information like comments or headers. Defaults to 0

parameters.name: columnDelimiter
parameters.description: The column delimiter in the CSV file

parameters.name: arrayDelimiter
parameters.description: The array delimiter (used for SIC values)

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: The columns in order. Defines how the CSV file should be parsed. Mandatory columns: itemId

requestBody.description: A list of items to patch the existing list of items with.

patch.description:
Updates the items in one or more stores with the provided list of items
Existing items will be updated. New items will be added.
Only populated fields will be updated. null or empty fields will not clear the corresponding field of existing items.Returns an id to the asynchronous update request, which can be used to query the items status endpoint. Store Permission Required: Modify Items

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description:
The List of store id's to perform update item.The store id's can be external id's or the store uuid's
If store id is not mentioned then it will update all the stores by default

requestBody.description: A list of items to patch the existing list of items with.

patch.summary: Update and add multiple items using csv
patch.description:
Updates the items in one or more stores with the provided list of items
Existing items will be updated. New items will be added.
Empty fields for defined columns will clear the corresponding field of existing items.Returns an id to the asynchronous update request, which can be used to query the items status endpoint. Store Permission Required: Modify Items Central Permission Required: CSV file import

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description:
The List of store id's to perform update item.The store id's can be external id's or the store uuid's
If store id is not mentioned then it will update all the stores by default

parameters.name: startRowIndex
parameters.description: The index of the row in the csv input where the parsing of the data should start from. This is usefull if the csv starts with irrelevant information like comments or headers. Defaults to 0

parameters.name: columnDelimiter
parameters.description: The column delimiter in the CSV file

parameters.name: arrayDelimiter
parameters.description: The array delimiter (used for SIC values)

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: The columns in order. Defines how the CSV file should be parsed. Mandatory columns: itemId

requestBody.description: A list of items to patch the existing list of items with.

get.summary: Endpoint to list all multi store request IDs
get.description:
Fetches a list of all multi store request IDs.

Central Permission Required: View Multi Store Request History

parameters.name: requestType
parameters.description: Filter result by request type

parameters.name: requestStatus
parameters.description: Filter result by request status

parameters.name: minimumAgeInDays
parameters.description: Limit result to requests older than the number of days specified by this parameter.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,asc|desc (ex: id,asc) Default sort order is ascending.

get.summary: Endpoint to fetch the result/progress for a given multi store request
get.description: Fetches the result/progress for a multi store request

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The id of the multi store request to fetch the result for

get.summary: Endpoint to fetch the original request payload
get.description: Fetches the original request payload for a given requestId

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The id of the multi store request to fetch the original request for

get.summary: Endpoint to list all multi store request IDs
get.description:
Fetches a list of all multi store request IDs.

Central Permission Required: View Multi Store Request History

parameters.name: requestType
parameters.description: Filter result by request type

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,asc|desc (ex: id,asc) Default sort order is ascending.

get.summary: Endpoint to fetch the original request payload
get.description: Fetches the original request payload for a given requestId

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The id of the multi store request to fetch the original request for

get.summary: Endpoint to fetch results of item update requests
get.description: Fetches the result of an update request specified by update item statusRequestId

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The id of the item update request to fetch results for

get.summary: Endpoint to fetch results of item delete requests
get.description: Fetches the result of an delete request specified by delete item statusRequestId

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The id of the item delete request to fetch results for

get.description: Returns all store if user has View All Stores central permission, otherwise returns store where user has any store permission

get.summary: Get single store status metrics based on store Uuid/externalID
get.description: Permission Required: View All Stores central permission or any store permission for the given storeId

get.summary: Get all transceivers for the supplied storeIds
get.description: Store Permission Required: View Infrastructure Configuration and Execute API REST

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description:
The List of store id's to get transceivers from. The store id's can be external id's or the store uuid's.
If the store id's are not mentioned then it will fetch transceivers from all the stores by default

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional status to filter on, can be OK, FAULTY and PENDING

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page.

get.summary: Get all basestations for the supplied storeIds
get.description: Store Permission Required: View Infrastructure Configuration and Execute API REST

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description:
The List of store id's to get basestations from. The store id's can be external id's or the store uuid's.
If the store id's are not mentioned then it will fetch basestations from all the stores by default

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional status to filter on, can be OK, FAULTY and PENDING

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page.

get.summary: Refresh your token to extend the expiry time
get.description: Refresh is used to extend the token expiry time without having to login again. Must be used to not store user credentials on the client.

get.summary: Get a token using Basic Authentication
get.description: Login must be called to get a token to authorize subsequent requests. The token will be valid for 4 hours and must be refreshed before it expires to keep the user/client logged in. This is the only endpoint protected with Basic Authentication. After a successful login - Bearer Authentication is used together with the returned token.

get.summary: Get a token from an Auth0 access token
get.description: Login by exchanging an Auth0 access token for a PCS token.

delete.description: Central Permission Required: Modify Store Security Tags

delete.summary: Delete a single item in multiple stores
delete.description:
Delete an item in one or more stores with the provided item ID
Returns an id to the asynchronous delete request, which can be used to query the delete items result endpoint. Store Permission Required: Modify Items

parameters.name: storeIds
parameters.description:
The list of store IDs that should delete this item. The store IDs can be external IDs or store UUIDs
If store id is not mentioned then it will update all the stores by default

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: Item ID to be deleted

requestId.description: The item update request id. Used as input to the item-result endpoint

requestId.description: The item update request id. Used as input to the item-result endpoint

ApiPublicMultiStoreV1ItemUpdateResponse.description: A class wrapping the id of an item update request

requestReceived.description: Date when this request was first received

requestCompleted.description: Date when this request was completed

requestReceived.description: Date when this request was first received

requestCompleted.description: Date when this request was completed

storeUuid.description: The store UUID this request belongs to

storeRequestId.description: The store request ID. Can be used to fetch detailed request result from the store

requestReceived.description: Date when this request was first received

requestCompleted.description: Date when this request was completed

status.description: The overall status of the item update request process

stores.description: A list of status entries on store level

status.description: The status of the item delete/update process respective to the store

itemsResultRequestId.description: The item request Id respective to the store. Used as input to the result endpoint in the respective store

itemsResultLink.description: The link to fetch detailed results of update/delete item

ApiPublicMultiStoreV1ItemUpdateStoreResu.description: A list of status entries on store level

status.description: The overall status of the item delete request process

stores.description: A list of status entries on store level

ApiPublicMultiStoreV1ItemDeleteResultRes.description: A class containing the response to an item delete status request

ApiPublicMonitoringV1EslMetrics.description: The ESL status of the store

ApiPublicMonitoringV1InfraMetrics.description: The infra status of the store

ApiPublicMonitoringV1IntegrationMetrics.description: The integration status of the store

ApiPublicMonitoringV1ItemMetrics.description: The item status of the store

ApiPublicMonitoringV1JobMetrics.description: The scheduled job status of the store

healthStatus.description: The communication/health status of the store

requestId.description: The delete item request id. Used as input to the items-delete-result endpoint

ApiPublicMultiStoreV1ItemDeleteResponse.description: A class wrapping the id of an item delete request
